titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Market Transition Act to include native pasture for livestock among the list of crops specifically identified as eligible for noninsured crop disaster assistance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Risk Management and Specialty Crops.

bill.summary: 6/4/1996--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act to make assistance available under the noninsured crop assistance program for native pasture for livestock.
